https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tJBrQokjBvHYHhcrWEf9IasRrrh.jpg Helmed by "Saturday Night Live" alumna Laura Kightlinger, this hourlong expos√© chronicles -- warts and all -- the life of comedian turned activist Randy Credico, an up-and-coming funnyman whose candor tanked his career. But the end of his showbiz days didn't stop him: He switched gears and became a mouthpiece for various causes, including the fight against New York's draconian drug laws. Credico's peers and ex-girlfriends weigh in with insights. 60 Spins Around the Sun
